00041 void cleanup(int ret)
00042 {
00043   // indicate mpi slaves to finish
00044 
00045 #ifdef MPI
00046   int task=TASKFIN;
00047   BroadcastTask(&task);
00048 
00049   MPI_Finalize();
00050 #endif
00051  
00052   // terminate program with return code
00053   exit(ret);
00054 }

00060 int main(int argc, char* argv[])
00061 {
00062 
00063   createinfo(argc, argv);
00064 
00065 #ifdef MPI
00066   MPI_Init(&argc, &argv);
00067   MPI_Comm_rank(MPI_COMM_WORLD, &mpirank);
00068   MPI_Comm_size(MPI_COMM_WORLD, &mpisize);
00069 
00070   // fprintf(stderr, "... [%2d] %s\n", mpirank, hostname());
00071 
00072   if (mpirank != 0) {
00073     // do the work
00074     ProjectionSlave();
00075 
00076     MPI_Finalize();
00077   } else {
00078 #endif
00079 
00080   // enough arguments ?
00081 
00082   if (argc < 4) {
00083     fprintf(stderr, "\nusage: %s [OPTIONS] PROJPARA INTERACTION [IDX:]MBSTATE"
00084             "\n   -h                hermitize matrix elements"
00085             "\n   -K K              use only K projection"
00086             "\n   -A                show really all eigenstates"
00087             "\n   -s                write Eigenstates into file\n",
00088             filepart(argv[0]));
00089     cleanup(-1);
00090   }
00091 
00092   int all=0;
00093   int hermit=0;
00094   int Ksel=0, K;
00095   int odd;
00096   int savestates=0;
00097   double threshkmix=0.00001;
00098   double minnorm=0.005;
00099 
00100   /* manage command-line options */
00101 
00102   char c;
00103   while ((c = getopt(argc, argv, "hK:Ast:")) != -1)
00104     switch (c) {
00105     case 'h':
00106       hermit=1;
00107       break;
00108     case 'K':
00109       Ksel=1;
00110       K = atoi(optarg);
00111       break;
00112     case 'A':
00113       all=1;
00114       break;
00115     case 's':
00116       savestates=1;
00117       break;
00118     case 't':
00119       threshkmix = atof(optarg);
00120       break;
00121     }
00122 
00123   char* projpar = argv[optind];
00124   char* interactionfile = argv[optind+1];
00125   char* mbfile = argv[optind+2];
00126 
00127   // many-body states up to now
00128   MultiSlaterDet Q;
00129   Indices In;
00130 
00131   extractIndicesfromString(&mbfile, &In);
00132 
00133   if (readMultiSlaterDetfromFile(&Q, &In, mbfile))
00134     cleanup(-1);
00135 
00136   if (In.n > 1) {
00137     fprintf(stderr, "specify a single index\n");
00138     cleanup(-1);
00139   }
00140 
00141   int idx = In.idx[0];
00142 
00143   int N = Q.N;
00144 
00145   // get rid of path in filename
00146   char* mbname = filepart(mbfile);
00147 
00148   Interaction Int;
00149   if (readInteractionfromFile(&Int, interactionfile))
00150     cleanup(-1);
00151   Int.cm = 1;
00152 
00153 #ifdef MPI
00154   int task=TASKSTART;
00155   BroadcastTask(&task);
00156   
00157   BroadcastInteraction(&Int);
00158   BroadcastA(&Q.A);
00159 #endif
00160 
00161   // odd numer of nucleons ?
00162   odd = Q.A % 2;
00163 
00164   // Projection parameters
00165   Projection P;
00166   initProjection(&P, odd, projpar);
00167 
00168   _setangkappacrit(25.0);
00169

00172   // initialize space for matrix elements
00173   Observablesod ***obsme = initprojectedMultiMBME(&P, &OpObservables,
00174                                                   &Q, &Q);
00175 
00176   // try to read ME's from file, if not possible calculate and save
00177 
00178   if (readprojectedMultiMBMEfromFile(mbfile, mbfile, &Q, &Q, 
00179                                      &P, &OpObservables, obsme)) {
00180 #ifdef MPI
00181     calcprojectedMultiMBMEmpi(&P, &OpObservables, &Q, &Q, obsme);
00182 #else
00183     calcprojectedMultiMBME(&P, &OpObservables, &Q, &Q, obsme);
00184 #endif

00187   }

00189   // hermitize MEs
00190   if (hermit)
00191     hermitizeprojectedMBME(&P, &OpObservables, &obsme[idx+idx*N], 1);
00192 
00193   fprintf(stderr, "... solving Eigenvalue problems\n");
00194 
00195   // solve the eigenvalue problem
00196   Eigenstates E;
00197   initEigenstates(&P, &E, 1);
00198 
00199   if (Ksel) 
00200     calcEigenstatesK(&P, &Int, &obsme[idx+idx*N], &E, K, threshkmix);
00201   else
00202     calcEigenstates(&P, &Int, &obsme[idx+idx*N], &E, threshkmix);
00203 
00204   fprintf(stderr, "... calculating expectation values\n");
00205   // calculate expectation values
00206   Symmetry S = Q.symmetry(&Q, idx);
00207   Observablesod** obs = initprojectedVector(&P, &OpObservables, 1);
00208   calcexpectprojectedMBME(&P, &OpObservables, &obsme[idx+idx*N], &S, &E, obs);
00209     
00210   // sort Eigenstates
00211   sortEigenstates(&P, &Int, obs, &E, minnorm, all); 
00212   // write output
00213   FILE *outfp; 
00214   char outfilename[255];
00215 
00216   snprintf(outfilename, 255, "%s:%d.%s", mbfile, idx,  
00217            ProjectiontoStr(&P));
00218 
00219   if (!(outfp = fopen(outfilename, "w"))) {
00220     fprintf(stderr, "couldn't open %s for writing\n", outfilename);
00221     cleanup(-1);
00222   }
00223 
00224   fprintinfo(outfp);

00226

00228 
00229   // only needed for output
00230   SlaterDet Q0;

00232   Q.get(&Q, idx, &Q0);
00233   
00234   showprojectedObservables(outfp, &P, &Int, &Q0, obs, &E, NULL, "");
00235 
00236   fprintf(outfp, "\n# end of file\n");
00237 
00238   fclose(outfp);
00239 
00240   S = Q.symmetry(&Q, idx);
00241 
00242   //  if (savestates)

00244
